<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A collection of Plate Tectonic animations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Platte Tectonic Animationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'animations tectoniques de plat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de animations tectonic da placa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di animazioni tettoniche della 
piastra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των τεκτονικών ζωτικοτήτων πιάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de animaciones tectónicas de la 
placa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Collection of learning objects on the subject of plate tectonics and the geological history of the continents</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plate tectonics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">continents</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Lernen wendet bezüglich der 
Plattentektonik und der geologischen Geschichte der Kontinente ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'étude objecte au sujet de la 
tectonique de plat et de l'histoire géologique des continents</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção da aprendizagem objeta no assunto do
tectonics de placa e no history geological dos continentes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di imparare obietta a proposito 
della tettonica di piastra e della storia geologica dei continenti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή της εκμάθησης αντιτίθεται σχετικά με το 
θέμα της τεκτονικής πιάτων και της γεωλογικής ιστορίας των 
ηπείρων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de aprender se opone a propósito 
de la tectónica de placa y de la historia geológica de los 
continentes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plattentektonik</string>
